nodes.text: The Taung & Zhell Society was a student society at the University of Coruscant, on the planet of the same name. The society shared its name with the Taung and Zhell, two ancient and historical sentient species from Coruscant. Tiaan Jerjerrod, a Tinnel IV native who later became a Moff of the Galactic Empire, was once a member of the society.

The Taung & Zhell Society was mentioned in the canon boxed set and reference book Star Wars: The Rebel Files, authored by Daniel Wallace and released in 2017. Wallace intended it as a reference to the Skull and Bones secret society at Yale University in New Haven, Connecticut.
